# uptimekuma_notification_alerta (Resource)

Alerta notification resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "uptimekuma_notification_alerta" "example" {
  name          = "Alerta Notifications"
  api_endpoint  = "https://alerta.example.com"
  api_key       = "your-alerta-api-key"
  environment   = "production"
  alert_state   = "alert"
  recover_state = "ok"
  is_active     = true
  is_default    = false
}

resource "uptimekuma_notification_alerta" "staging" {
  name          = "Alerta Staging"
  api_endpoint  = "https://alerta-staging.example.com"
  api_key       = "your-staging-api-key"
  environment   = "staging"
  alert_state   = "critical"
  recover_state = "resolved"
  is_active     = true
  is_default    = false
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `api_endpoint` (String) Alerta API endpoint
- `api_key` (String, Sensitive) Alerta API key
- `name` (String) Notification name

### Optional

- `alert_state` (String) Alert state for incoming alerts
- `apply_existing` (Boolean)
- `environment` (String) Alerta environment
- `is_active` (Boolean)
- `is_default` (Boolean)
- `recover_state` (String) Alert state for recovered alerts

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) Notification identifier
